name: FAIR_Universe_High_Energy_Physics_Dataset
description: A dataset containing particle collision features for classification tasks (e.g., ztautau, diboson, ttbar, htautau).
citation: Bhimji, W., Calafiura, P., Chakkappai, R., Chang, P.-W., Chou, Y.-T., Diefenbacher, S., Dudley, J., Elham E Khoda, Ghosh, A., Farrell, S., Guyon, I., Harris, C., Hsu, S.-C., Nachman, B., Rousseau, D., Thorne, B., Ullah, I., & Zhang, Y. (2025). FAIR Universe - HiggsML Uncertainty Challenge Public Dataset [Data set]. Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), Vancouver, Canada. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15131565

distribution.name: FAIR_Universe_HiggsML_data
distribution.description: Primary parquet dataset and metadata in zip format.

recordSet.name: particle_collisions
recordSet.description: Records of particle collision events with derived kinematic features.

field.name: PRI_had_pt
field.description: Transverse momentum px2+py2 of the hadronic tau.

field.name: PRI_had_eta
field.description: The pseudorapidity η of the hadronic tau.

field.name: PRI_had_phi
field.description: Azimuthal angle (ϕ) of the hadronic tau

field.name: PRI_lep_pt
field.description: Transverse momentum px2+py2 of the lepton (electron or muon)

field.name: PRI_lep_eta
field.description: Pseudorapidity of the lepton (electron or muon)

field.name: PRI_lep_phi
field.description: Azimuthal angle (ϕ) of the lepton (electron or muon)

field.name: PRI_met
field.description: Missing transverse energy (MET) of the event

field.name: PRI_met_phi
field.description: Azimuthal angle (ϕ) of the missing transverse energy (MET)

field.name: PRI_n_jets
field.description: Number of jets in the event

field.name: PRI_jet_leading_pt
field.description: Transverse momentum px2+py2 of the leading jet, that is the jet with the largest transverse momentum (undefined if PRI_jet_num = 0)

field.name: PRI_jet_leading_eta
field.description: Pseudorapidity η of the leading jet (undefined if PRI_jet_num = 0)

field.name: PRI_jet_leading_phi
field.description: Azimuth angle ϕ of the leading jet (undefined if PRI_jet_num = 0)

field.name: PRI_jet_subleading_pt
field.description: Transverse momentum px2+py2 of the subleading jet, that is the jet with the second largest transverse momentum (undefined if PRI_jet_num < 2)

field.name: PRI_jet_subleading_eta
field.description: Pseudorapidity η of the subleading jet (undefined if PRI_jet_num < 2)

field.name: PRI_jet_subleading_phi
field.description: Azimuth angle ϕ of the subleading jet (undefined if PRI_jet_num < 2)

field.name: PRI_jet_all_pt
field.description: Scalar sum of transverse momentum of all the jets of the events

field.name: DER_mass_transverse_met_lep
field.description: Transverse mass between the missing transverse energy and the lepton.

field.name: DER_mass_vis
field.description: The invariant mass of the hadronic tau and the lepton.

field.name: DER_pt_h
field.description: The modulus of the vector sum of transverse momentum of the hadronic tau, the lepton and the missing transverse energy vector.

field.name: DER_deltaeta_jet_jet
field.description: The absolute value of the pseudorapidity separation between the two jets (undefined if PRI_jet_num ≤ 1).

field.name: DER_mass_jet_jet
field.description: The invariant mass of the two jets (undefined if PRI_jet_num ≤ 1).

field.name: DER_prodeta_jet_jet
field.description: The product of the pseudorapidities of the two jets (undefined if PRI_jet_num ≤ 1).

field.name: DER_deltar_had_lep
field.description: The R separation between the hadronic tau and the lepton.

field.name: DER_pt_tot
field.description: The modulus of the vector sum of the missing transverse momenta and transverse momenta of the hadronic tau, the lepton, the leading jet (if PRI_jet_num ≥ 1) and the subleading jet (if PRI_jet_num = 2) (but not of any additional jets).

field.name: DER_sum_pt
field.description: The sum of the moduli of the transverse momenta of the hadronic tau, the lepton, the leading jet (if PRI_jet_num ≥ 1) and the subleading jet (if PRI_jet_num = 2) and the other jets (if PRI_jet_num = 3).

field.name: DER_pt_ratio_lep_had
field.description: The ratio of the transverse momentum of the lepton to that of the hadronic tau.

field.name: DER_met_phi_centrality
field.description: The centrality of the azimuthal angle of the missing transverse energy vector w.r.t. the hadronic tau and the lepton

field.name: DER_lep_eta_centrality
field.description: The centrality of the pseudorapidity of the lepton w.r.t. the two jets (undefined if PRI_jet_num ≤ 1)

field.name: labels
field.description: Simplified class labels (1 for signal, 0 for background)

field.name: detailed_labels
field.description: Detailed class labels

field.name: weights
field.description: Event weights for statistical analysis
